page.title: 10Local Games
page.content: Fireball At least six girls form a circle. A ball is passed around.When someone drops it they get the ball and throw it to the person next to them, then they have to try and run round the outside of the circle and get back to their place as the ball is passed from one girl to the next. If the ball reaches the space first,the girl is out.If the girl gets back first the game begins again.If someone is out she sits in the middle and sucks her thumb until someone else is out. Skipping Rhyme One of our favourite skipping games is 'Drip Drop' Drip drop,drop it in the sea. Please pull the rope for me. Are you coming? Coming to the fair? No No the fair's not there!
